metadata.title: Posey Green Six Handle Nylon Gait Belt 6537Q
features: This Listing Is For Quick-Release Economy Transfer Belts
description: Extra wide soft nylon belt provides greater contact area with patients.Sewn-on handles provide multiple vertical and horizontal grasping points.Available in either a quick-release nylon buckle or nickel-plated buckle.Machine washable.
